alert.note: Alert for Sampson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 3:13PM EST by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL SAMPSON COUNTY THROUGH 415 PM EST... At 313 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Elizabethtown, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clinton, Roseboro, Garland, Newton Grove, Turkey, and Hobbton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST for central North Carolina.
